  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202759</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Women of the South in a Changing Society</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frauen des Südens in einer ändernden 
Gesellschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Femmes des Sud dans une société 
changeante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mulheres do sul em uma sociedade em mudança</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Donne del sud in una società cambiante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γυναίκες του νότου σε μια μεταβαλλόμενη κοινωνία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mujeres del sur en una sociedad que cambia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson examines the lives of women in Southern Appalachia and other areas of the south during the Civil War and focuses particular attention on analyzing the historical stereotypes of women of the 19th-century.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion überprüft die Leben der Frauen in 
Südappalachia und andere Bereiche des Südens während des 
Bürgerkrieges und der bestimmten Aufmerksamkeit der Foki auf dem 
Analysieren der historischen Stereotypen der Frauen des 19th-century.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon examine les vies des femmes dans 
Appalachia méridional et d'autres domaines des sud pendant 
la guerre civile et d'une attention particulière de foyers sur 
analyser les stéréotypes historiques des femmes du 19th-century.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição examina as vidas das mulheres em 
Appalachia do sul e outras áreas do sul durante a guerra civil e de 
atenção particular dos focos em analisar os stereotypes históricos 
das mulheres do 19th-century.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione esamina le vite delle donne in 
Appalachia del sud ed altri campi del sud durante la guerra civile e 
di particolare attenzione dei fuochi con analizzare gli stereotipi 
storici delle donne del 19th-century.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα εξετάζει τις ζωές των γυναικών σε 
νότιο Appalachia και άλλους τομείς του νότου κατά τη διάρκεια
του εμφύλιου πολέμου και στρέφει την ιδιαίτερη προσοχή στην 
ανάλυση των ιστορικών στερεοτύπων των γυναικών του 19$ος-αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección examina las vidas de mujeres en 
Appalachia meridional y otras áreas del sur durante la guerra civil y
de la atención determinada de los focos en analizar los estereotipos 
históricos de las mujeres del 19th-century.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
